kpi_info.title: Successful codec resource reservation
kpi_info.use: Indicates successful resource reservations, when reserving signalling transcoding codec in measured MGW
kpi_info.formula:
SUM( CODEC_G711_A_LAW + CODEC_G711_U_LAW +
CODEC_G711_A_LAW_CN + CODEC_G711_U_LAW_CN +
CODEC_GSM_EFR + CODEC_GSM_FR + CODEC_GSM_HR +
CODEC_FR_AMR + CODEC_HR_AMR +
CODEC_UMTS_AMR + CODEC_UMTS_AMR2 + CODEC_UMTS_AMR_WB +
CODEC_G723_1 + CODEC_G723_1A +
CODEC_G729_A + CODEC_G729_AB +
CODEC_ILBC + CODEC_ILBC_CN +
CODEC_FR_AMR_WB +
DTMF_CODEC_RESERVED )

Counters from AGGREGATED view(s)
